source:
## T-SQL INNER JOIN

```sql
SELECT * FROM 
    chicago.safety_data one 
INNER JOIN chicago.safety_data two ON one.Address = two.Address;
```
## Spark SQL

%%sql

SELECT * FROM 
    chicago.safety_data one 
INNER JOIN chicago.safety_data two ON one.Address = two.Address;
## DataFrame API (C#)
